    • itemComparison

      public static boolean itemComparison(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack first, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack second, boolean hasItemMeta, boolean hasDisplayName, boolean hasLore)
      Compares two items by Material and if hasItemMeta is true, by name and/or by lore
      Parameters:
      first - The first item
      second - The second item
      hasItemMeta - If True, it compares names and/or lores
      hasDisplayName - If True, it compares names
      hasLore - If True, it compares lores
      Returns:
      True if both items are the same, False instead

    • compareName

      private static boolean compareName(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack first, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack second, boolean hasItemMeta, boolean hasDisplayName)
      Compare first and second item's names
      Parameters:
      first - The first item
      second - The second item
      hasItemMeta - If True compares if both items has meta
      hasDisplayName - If True compares if both items has same name
      Returns:
      True if first and second item's Names are same, False instead
